title: Secrets in the Snow
description: In this Dateline classic, after Stephanie Bruner goes missing in the Colorado mountains, three suspects and a love triangle complicate the investigation. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on October 5, 2012.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
